Source code for memb_funcs

""" Membership function types, ranging from constant, linear or other more complex shape mapping """
# pylint: disable=fixme, invalid-name, R0903
from typing import Any



[docs]class FunctionBase:
    """Function Meta"""




[docs]class Constant(FunctionBase):
    """Constant function. Returns the initialization value"""


[docs]    def __init__(self, value: float) -> None:
        self.value = value


    def __call__(self, data: Any) -> float:
        return self.value




[docs]class Linear(FunctionBase):
    """Linear function"""


[docs]    def __init__(self, slope: float, b: float) -> None:
        self.slope = slope
        self.b = b


    def __call__(self, data) -> float:
        return self.slope * data + self.b




[docs]class Smf(FunctionBase):
    """S-shaped membership function"""




[docs]class Pimf(FunctionBase):
    """Pi-shaped membership function"""




[docs]class Zmf(FunctionBase):
    """Z-shaped membership function"""




[docs]class Trimf(FunctionBase):
    """Triangular membership function"""




[docs]class Trapmf(FunctionBase):
    """Trapezoidal membership function"""




[docs]class Gaussmf(FunctionBase):
    """Gaussian membership function"""




[docs]class Gauss2mf(FunctionBase):
    """Gaussian combination membership function"""




[docs]class Gbellmf:
    """Generalized bell-shaped membership function"""
